title: PvP Training V.1
briefDescription: Welcome to PvP Training V.1 ! This map is here to train you in PvP even if you are a beginner ! There will probably be some ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to PvP Training V.1 ! This map is here to train you in PvP even if you are a beginner !
There will probably be some bug updates / level additions, so let us know what you think of the map in the comments ! ;D

title: Six To Win ? Adventure Map
briefDescription: I welcome everyone to Six To Win.A unique, original adventure map, but above all very entertaining.Inside they will find various mini-games and challenges ...
Description:
I welcome everyone to Six To Win.

A unique, original adventure map, but above all very entertaining.

Inside they will find various mini-games and challenges that they must overcome in order to continue advancing, and thus reach the end, having collected the six wools belonging to the monument.

You want to know more? Keep reading!

crawledImageUrls.text:
In one of the many mini-games that you will find, one of them will be the classic and much loved ?Find the button.?
Who never played it and ended up frustrated looking for that little hidden button?
Of course he couldn?t be absent.

Do you remember that nightmare you once had about being locked in identical rooms with no exit?
I?m sorry to tell you that it has come true.
Losing yourself until you find the end will be your only way out.

You will go from running like a leopard to jumping like a rabbit.
I advise you to prepare those legs and wear protection, falls will be inevitable.

Six To Win, in addition to having a large number and diversity of fun challenges, does not stop standing out for its beautiful infrastructure and precise details.
Each room, room and lobby was carefully thought out to look perfect and dazzle each one with its originality and beauty.
Without more to say, I?ll wait for you inside to start this new adventure together.

title: A Mercenary?s Revenge Part One
briefDescription: A Mercenary's Revenge is the story about one mercenary (you) on a quest to get back at those who wronged them. The story starts out ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A Mercenary?s Revenge is the story about one mercenary (you) on a quest to get back at those who wronged them. The story starts out with you playing through a flashback building up to part two. There will be tests and trials and bosses to defeat. Can you make it through and defeat the one who betrayed you?
This map features:
This map aims to have a detailed story with interesting mechanics and combat. If you have any questions, concerns, or just want to talk feel free to reach out to me!
In-game Photos

title: Sister?s House 1.2.1 ? Horror Map
briefDescription: You are an ordinary person who forgot about your sister and family because of work! You have to visit your sister and relatives, they live ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You are an ordinary person who forgot about your sister and family because of work! You have to visit your sister and relatives, they live in the same house! But what is it!? You?re locked in the house! Your mission now: Find out what?s going on and escape!
This is a horror map in which you have to find out your sister?s secret and why did she become like this!
This map was created by two developers: Gosha 29 and AnimeSHnik. KA
This is map can be scary, complete puzzles, run away from your sister and find Easter eggs!
The map will have updates and there will be many of them! Good luck!

title: ?King of the Hill?
briefDescription: The game is that everyone will try to reach the top of the hill to be the winner but it will not be easy, because ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The game is that everyone will try to reach the top of the hill to be the winner but it will not be easy, because all of you will be able to hit each other to try to throw the players, the first to reach 300 credits on the hill won.
in the lobby there are some options such as weapons and armor and at its level is the entrance to the games there are 3 different maps

title: The WatchTower Guard
briefDescription: The WatchTower Guard is an old adventure map I made and thought I'd share it. It is a journey style map and is meant for ...

crawledImageUrls.text: The WatchTower Guard is an old adventure map I made and thought I?d share it. It is a journey style map and is meant for single player but does work with co-op. I has four chapters with the final one resulting in a boss fight. Takes 20 minutes on average to complete. You can choose your difficulty and there is light combat until the boss. This map uses commands.

You live in a small village in the woods. Nothing ever happens there but one day the village guard goes missing. It?s your job to venture out and find him. Use the notes he left behind to piece together what happened to him and follow the trail to bring him home. What will you find on your journey?

title: Mr. Meat
briefDescription: Mr. Meat is a horror, adventure mobile game and it was originally made by Keplerians Team for mobile devices. As it is extremely scary I ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Mr. Meat is a horror, adventure mobile game and it was originally made by Keplerians Team for mobile devices. As it is extremely scary I decided to recreate it in minecraft bedrock edition as a horror map. How do I play? A girl is locked in this ?prison? house that seems to be a haunted house. The mission is to save her and escape the house but you only have 3 nights to accomplish it.. Keep in mind, that Mr Meat can hear your moves, you can use this advantage to mislead him. How do I escape? You will have to find the correct items in order to escape and save the poor girl.
I hope you like it?.
Mr Meat 1.9.3 update from the original mobile game.
As you can see, the house it?s bigger and there are lots of places where to explore. Mr Meat evil pig was added in this map, and is ready to hunt you down! If you spot any glitches, feel free to contact me through the comments down here or via Youtube and I will answer most of them!

title: Swoogo?s Kit PvP World
briefDescription: This is a Medium size kit pvp map that was used on the popular Swoogo's Kit PvP Realm. This is the fourth map used on ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a Medium size kit pvp map that was used on the popular Swoogo?s Kit PvP Realm. This is the fourth map used on his realm and it is now free to use by anyone else.
Feel free to play with your friends and use on your own realm only if you credit Swoogo!

title: Kit PvP (Story Mode BETA)
briefDescription: Kit PvP is a map that is what it says! It contains 11 Kits, 3 Maps, and 3 Mini Games! It is designed to be played with at ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Kit PvP is a map that is what it says! It contains 11 Kits, 3 Maps, and 3 Mini Games! It is designed to be played with at least three people, and is an excellent party game! You may record on this map as long as you provide the link to this page on your video.
I?m going to run you through all the stuff this map includes.
Kits
Mage
Comes with lots of potions!
Warrior
Iron armor, diamond sword, shield, basic survival outfit.
Barbarian
Super strong but Super slow! Equipped with FULL NETHERITE
Fisherman
Fly up to ledges with your elytra and reel in unsuspecting victims, and stab them with your fishing hook!
Ghost
Hard to see and catch, Fun to play as, though!
Archer
Just a guy with a bow and shield.
Superhero
Speed, leaping, strength, and slow falling! But watch out! You only have leather boots!
Demon
Burn down the entire map!
Magician
Cast spells on your opponents.
Mermaid
Throw or stab with your trident!
Demolition
Fire explosive rockets at your enemies while laughing like a madman.
MAPS
Flaming Crator

It may be misspelled, but this map is perfect for PvP! Parkour, structures, lava, you name it, it has it as long as it was in that list!
Ghost City

This city seems to be abandoned. Perfect place for homicide! (Wait, will that get me reported?). This map as plenty of places to take shelter, and even sewers! Ew?
Thick Forest

title: Home Sweet Home
briefDescription: Ahh... Home Sweet Home. Until it isn?t. Explore a giant house on a quest for mini games and emeralds. This map is different than ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ahh? Home Sweet Home. Until it isn?t. Explore a giant house on a quest for mini games and emeralds. This map is different than most as you have to search for the things to do, like a game of hide and seek. You can also join the official realm which should be linked somewhere around here.
Home Sweet Home is a mini-game realm/world that focuses on exploration. Run around a giant house searching for loot! Items and mini-games can be found anywhere from furniture, to snow globes, to aquariums! This map is also a joinable realm if you want to play with friends or fellow loot enthusiasts! The map can be a bit confusing but as long as you explore ALL of you surroundings everything will be okay.
There are currently 4 rooms with a total of 6 mini-games and our team is constantly updating the realm, with more updates coming here soon. There is also one hidden music disc for every game, and if you manage to find them all? well? something special will happen.
Current Mini-games:
Parkour Paradise: Over 3 hours of parkour! Trust me I sat through it, well actually I was sprinting,,, Includes a spawn lobby that branches out into different levels
Ceiling Fan Skyblock: Generator based Skyblock that includes public mines, plots, islands, shops, and multiple worlds to explore.
The Labyrinth: A gigantic maze inside a? couch? Contains four endings and a potion shop to unlock new areas.
Boat Racing: 2 race tracks, one looped and one finite, to try out! Includes auto boat reset system.
Jungle Hyjinx: Jungle Hyjinx is a survival mini-game set in, well a jungle duh.
Nether Factions: This is coming soon, but it will be free roaming of the entire nether.
Every game also has it?s own secrets and ways to earn emeralds. Spend emeralds on lottery tickets, crates or the shops.
There are currently four rooms to explore with more on the way, you just have to find them.
There will also be a Christmas Update on December 12th that is mostly for the realm.
Discord: https://discord.gg/msWSVeCSsY

And it took a week of constant work to make, so please don?t criticize.

title: FrozenMinigames (Stage 1)
briefDescription: Snow everywhere!! To escape the snowy place you have to finish Minigames. This is the first stage of frozen Minigames so this adventure is an ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Snow everywhere!! To escape the snowy place you have to finish Minigames. This is the first stage of frozen Minigames so this adventure is an easy one. You can also play multiplayer with your friends and compete amongst yourselves.

Firstly,
You will have to go through a very easy snow parkour. If you take it easy it will be easy. (When you fall down you can always use the ladders to get up).
There are two more Minigames which are not worth describing so experience it yourself.

title: Invasion
briefDescription: Today is your check for new job. Show your best and get a job at the your dreams research center! Get new friends or save ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Today is your check for new job. Show your best and get a job at the your dreams research center! Get new friends or save from save the whole world from strange mind-control alien, or maybe you will unleash him?
By making this map i tried show all capabilities of NPC mobs from Minecraft Education Edition
You think that it is best work for you because it is not far from home?
?and you?ll get the real cake, that not lie!

Could you get this job, or you?ll be inadmissible for this?
The research center offers you several tests, for example:
Coordination test
Accuracy Test
Jumping test

And more, that you could see by yourself
You are allowed to walk around the closed to the public places of the center, and check technical rooms.

title: INVASION: BASEMENT
briefDescription: Hello. This is a continuation of my last map. Invasion: Basement became much better than the original - bigger, more interesting and less confusing. I ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello. This is a continuation of my last map. Invasion: Basement became much better than the original ? bigger, more interesting and less confusing. I think that if you played the first part, you will like the second one more.
In this map you will test new virtual reality technology, see the old floors of the Center, and rest floor.
You?ll see ruins of old Center, and basement flooded floors
You will face invisible obstacles
You?ll start at the highest floor, and gradually you will sink lower and lower ?
Can you escape from here?
Attention: This map will often require new swimming from Aquatic Update. Example here:

title: Ftere?s Non Geometry Map
briefDescription: Old:This is my first map please don't judge me. I play on mcpe 1.16.0.58 and it works. I have used the warped buttons and signs....

crawledImageUrls.text:
Old:
This is my first map please don?t judge me. I play on mcpe 1.16.0.58 and it works. I have used the warped buttons and signs.
It is created with command blocks, ask me if you want a tutorial.
I created a little room full of strange things. Will you discover them all?
New
It works fine for me in 1.16.100, but it should work on older versions too?
Write in comments what I should add.
In my version addons that adds blocks doesn?t work and the map Is totally functional without any resource pack.
In the map you will try to escape from a strange laboratory where you are imprisoned, good luck!

this is the start, the map for now is very small but I will update it often.
Please leave credits, and, if you wont, you can make a video and post it on YouTube.
In this map were used much command blocks for create: an infinite loop, a teleporting door, an unlimited succession of rooms, a flat staircase, another teleporting door (compressed)? I will add more in future. If you like it support me. In the 0.0.3 update I added the red version: everything will have a red theme. In the 0.0.4 I added a big part of the map and a little bit lore! For now, there isn?t an ending! ? But I will add it soon! In this map you will find a building of quartz, that I will expand in every update. ?Actually you start in an area where there are three rooms, if you go left you will see the ending but not how to reach it, of you go into the second room you will be teleported in the first. You will enter in a room with a glass floor and go down. There are a lot of features that you can discover. I excuse me, but for add a lore i created a troll. There is only one jump and it?s impossible! I hope you like it, enjoy. I added a Little part of the map, where you should click a lever ti open the path.
Hello, it?s me again. I played with Dragekk a lot and made a complete remake of the map, using the clone command and not the tp one I hope you will enjoy the new map.

title: Lily?s Mystery: Finding Sophie Chapter 2 (Horror)
briefDescription: We will continue the story of the father who lost his daughter inside Lily's House (your daughter's bestfriend)Requirements: TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN YOUR ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
We will continue the story of the father who lost his daughter inside Lily?s House (your daughter?s bestfriend)
Requirements: TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN YOUR ROOM!
And This map is not recommended for those person who has a heart problems
This map contains loud noises and jumpscares that not suitable for those person who has a heart problem.
Note: I recommend to turn off the lights in your room because most of the rooms in this map has a limited amount of light source.
You can also play this map with your friend but the maximum player is 2 you cannot play this map with 3 or more players or the game will crash or it will not work properly.
This map needs a lot of patience, for some people it will be hard to finish this map but dont give up cause everything has solution on our problem! Just try to figure it out!
+ How to play?
? Collect and read books to find what?s your next move
? Find keys to unlock locked doors (some doors/gates doesn?t need keys to be unlock, they have buttons or lever to be open! )
? Dont commit suicide!
+ Requirements:
? MCBE ver 1.16.x +
? A strong device (lower device is not tested yet)
? Turn off the lights in your room
? Brightness ? 90%-100%
? Volume ? [Youre Choice!]
? Time and Patience
+ Notes:
? Do not take any items from the armor stands
? Do not kill armor stands
? Dont give your items on armor stands
? Never Commit suicide
? Reading Books can lead you for your next move!
? Never leave your partner alone!
? There are different types of potions! 2 throwable and 1 drinkable they also have different amount of healing effects
+ How to play in Multiplayer?
? First click the ?Teleport all players here? button from the lobby
? Second click the ?Choose Character? button from the lobby to select character
? The first one who will click the button will be the player 1
? And the second player who will click the button will be the player 2

Note: Your player character(s) will depend on your xp level or experience level! Level 1 is player 1 and Level 2 is player 2 if theres some problem on choosing character you can reply on the comment box below! And also do not start the game if the other player is not yet ready
